summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4810 for the improvement of Juneau Street from Beacon Avenue to a point 250 feet east of 25th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55529 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
